website_summaries.verdict: The Adidas Edge Gameday aims to become a for-anywhere performance shoe that can handle any activity. It is even touted to be a solid option for speed training on the roads. Neutral pronators are the target market for this product. Also, it has a sporty yet uncomplicated construction that can be ready for casual strolls.
pros: The forefoot section of this Adidas running shoe is welcomed by most testers for its roomy construction
Several consumers have commented that the Adidas Edge Gameday is responsive
The shoelace-and-overlay combo of the upper unit is appreciated because of the dutiful foot-security that occurs
People have noted that the traction given by the outsole is reliable and agreeable to the movements of the foot
‘Lightweight’ is a term that some runners have used to laud the weight of the Adidas Edge Gameday
cons: A few consumers have reported that the inner sleeve has a tendency to be torn
Some purchasers are unhappy because the lining and the insole apparently have a tendency to irritate the foot

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe
customer_reviews.text: They look good. They appear to be high quality. However, they run very small. They were at least 1 size smaller than the US size. Since I wear a size 16 they don't go any larger. Too bad, I wish they fit.
customer_reviews.author: D K

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe, too small
customer_reviews.text: Shoe is a good looking shoe. However is about a half size to small. This is the trouble with online shopping. It's easy and quick doesnt always work out like trying them on in store.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Best value workout sneakers
customer_reviews.text: Best work out shoes. Very comfortable, a little snug, however I like it over being too lose.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer McNally

customer_reviews.title: very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I walk/jog 5-6 miles almost everyday. These sneakers are extremely comfortable and they look very good. I get compliments, people ask me where I bought them from. Bottom part is thick enough but soft and light weight. Highly recommended for people who keep moving.
customer_reviews.author: Ertan Tulumoglu

customer_reviews.title: comfortable shoes but...
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't really consider these running shoes as there's not as much support around the soles compared to shoes like Asics and New Balance. Running in these made my shins ache from the lack of support. I would recommend as chillers or walking/light activity shoes but nothing beyond that. Also, due to the reviews I ordered a size up and it fit perfectly. I will be continuing my hunt for some proper running shoes because these aint it. Also, I would not recommend working out in these either unless your definition of working out is walking on the treadmill for an hour then by all means...
customer_reviews.author: leftovers

customer_reviews.title: It's comfortable for the most part
customer_reviews.text: It is fine when I'm walking, since I have bad knees, but when I run, I get all the soreness in my calfs and shins. However, this is due to me not running for a long period of time. Since I do have knee and ankle problems, none of my joints hurt after I am done running, so there's a plus for that. Don't recommend using it for weight lifting because it has weird traction.
customer_reviews.author: Yousif Nash

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Really comfy. Fit perfectly. Not too small at all as some others have mentioned. And, if you're at all worried about the souls being to fluffy and corny like i was, turns out they're actually ok. Good looking shoe and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: second pair. very comfy. big boy sizes 15
customer_reviews.text: If you are a big foot like me(size 15). buy, buy , buy! They fit very comfortable with my Adidas jumpsuit. I ordered two pairs. had them on all day felt like i had on house shoes out side. RUN-D-MC style
customer_reviews.author: Victor Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: Too tight across big toes
customer_reviews.text: The length seemed about right 10. Even ordered a half size larger and it was too tight across my big toes. Liked the color weight and construction but toenails started hurting after a short while.
customer_reviews.author: Sparky

customer_reviews.title: Yep
customer_reviews.text: Extremely comfortable and stylish... I also like the reflective style... A trusted company
customer_reviews.author: Robert Busa

customer_reviews.title: Very good, but ...
customer_reviews.text: Great looking shoe. Also, it's light, without much sole cushioning, and a bit tight for my taste (I like Adidas because it generally feels as if it's cut wider. Not this shoe). I'll probably use it more for walking than running, and if I'd buy another pair, it will be at least half a point bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Blair

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy and improves performance!
customer_reviews.text: Fits snug to prevent any moving about while running. The bounce technology adds comf6and stability better than other shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Vishal Sharma

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, comfort & quiet
customer_reviews.text: The best thing about these shoes is that they don't stick to the marble floor and make the dreaded noise with each step which lets the whole floor know that you have arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy these!!
customer_reviews.text: Gave a star only because I couldn’t submit this review with selecting one...Shoes arrived, open the box! I was excited until I looked closely, and noticed with faded yellow stains, don’t know what it is, don’t want to touch them!! Waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Jesus M Villar

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. One of best purchases ever. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: charles boyette

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the shoes
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the shoes , the fit just right they look good .
customer_reviews.author: Rick Smith

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable shoe and light weight
customer_reviews.text: This is a great fitting shoe. Not too tight but just right. Very light weight. I bought another pair, and maybe will buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Mel Cutter

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Not my first pair of Adidas and they never disappoint. Very comfortable, excellent fit! I'm enjoying them quite a bit!
customer_reviews.author: Spectre13

customer_reviews.title: Awkward until wearing them in
customer_reviews.text: The insoles or lining piece right under your foot. At first mine seemed like it wasn’t cut right. But after wearing them in, it seemed to find its shape. Overall they are light and feel nice
customer_reviews.author: Brad Glass

customer_reviews.title: well fitting running shoe for a 6'4" person with a size 15 running shoe
customer_reviews.text: shoe feels very stable with good support. Box toe is ample but not too loose. I ran very well the first day I put these shoes on.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Cox

customer_reviews.title: Squeaky Shoes
customer_reviews.text: After about a month of wearing these pretty comfortable sneakers, I can't get them to stop squeaking. They squeak on any surface inside or outside.
customer_reviews.author: sara dalicandro

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This shoes is ideal for road running. It is lightweight and well cushioned. Planning to get a different color.
customer_reviews.author: Dwight M.

customer_reviews.title: It's quite hot
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice pair of shoes, it's smooth but too hot. I couldn't wear it all day when it wet my feet
customer_reviews.author: Luc

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for any occasion,  but super light for running.
customer_reviews.text: Lots of compliments when wearing, super comfy, and light weight. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and decent pairs of shoes
customer_reviews.text: This is very comfortable and color is decent for casual wear. I am wearing this with trousers or jeans and look perfect on both. This fits perfectly, so its good to order your regular size. The sole seems like rigid so perfect for long walk or running.
customer_reviews.author: Kamal

customer_reviews.title: The other people who wrote this isn't good shoe support are right
customer_reviews.text: I like red shoes, so I thought I would give these a shot. They are very aesthetically pleasing, however, they are not very comfortable to wear. It is pinchy around the head of the shoe and it is not very good at the heel. It feels like you are wearing oddly elevated heels and even walking around it is not very comfortable, never mind running. I will likely be returning these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Hold Up
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable! I have a super hard time finding shoes because I am a 7 xx-wide in women’s, but I ordered a 6 in these and they fit perfect, maybe even a little big. I’ve worn these over 10 times now and they still look pretty much brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Lila

customer_reviews.title: These run short!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes run very short. The chart of lengths of sizes is a fiction. I needed two sizes larger than my usual.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my fiancé for his birthday. We love Adidas. He’s never worn this style so I was skeptical at first but he loves them and we will probably get more in the other colors! Fits true to size and he says they’re comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Geovana

customer_reviews.title: Worth buying!
customer_reviews.text: Finally found some nice, comfortable, and affordable white shoes. Fit perfectly but I hope they last long because they don't feel like they will.
customer_reviews.author: James M.

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I do alot of walking and driving at work and these shoes are amazing & very comfortable. I'm very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Tha Stevo Show

customer_reviews.title: Box was torn up
customer_reviews.text: Received the shoes but when I went to wrap them today the box was torn all up. I wrapped them without the box so I have something to give. I hope he doesn't think their used. So SAD!
customer_reviews.author: Richard nadrash

product_meta.title: adidas Men's Edge Gameday Sneaker
feature_bullets: Men's edge game day; The adidas brand has a long history and deep-rooted Connection with sport. Everything we do is rooted in sport.; Driven by a relentless pursuit of innovation as well as decades of accumulating sports science expertise, we cater for all, from elite professional athletes and teams to any individual who wants to make sport part of their lives
